hello_welcome: Fullstack developer and passionate about my work
presentation_text_1: Hello, my name is Guillaume and I really enjoy practicing this profession, in which I lose track of time. I love taking on new challenges and learning from them.
presentation_text_2: Resilient and persistent by nature, I invest a lot in the projects I undertake and commit to delivering high-quality work.
presentation_text_3: You can discover the details of my expertise further down on this page, as well as through this very website.
presentation_text_4: If you're interested in my profile or need my services, don't hesitate to contact me via my contact form
presentation_text_5: Apart from IT, I'm a nature lover and always amazed by the beauty of landscapes our planet has to offer.
presentation_text_6: That's why, through this website, I wanted to share photos of all my journeys.
presentation_text_7: I am passionate about creating innovative tech solutions, with a strong focus on continuous improvement and efficiency. I've worked on several exciting projects and gained expertise in various languages and tools. I firmly believe that technology should not only solve problems but also improve users' quality of life.

conditions.title: Terms and Conditions
conditions.intro_text: These Terms and Conditions (T&Cs) govern access to and use of the website guillaume-quesnel.com accessible at https://guillaume-quesnel.com. By using this website, you agree to the terms and conditions outlined below.

acceptance.title: 2. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By accessing or using this website, you accept these T&Cs. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use this website.

access.title: 3. Access to the Website
access.text: Access to the website is free, but it may be subject to restrictions. We reserve the right to restrict access to certain sections or the entire website for technical or legal reasons.

intellectual_property.title: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.text: All content on the website guillaume-quesnel.com (texts, images, logos, videos, etc.) is protected by copyright and intellectual property laws. Any unauthorized reproduction or use of the content is prohibited.

responsibility.title: 5. Responsibility
responsibility.text: The website guillaume-quesnel.com cannot be held responsible for any direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of this website, including errors in the content, service interruptions, or data loss.

personal_data.title: 6. Personal Data
personal_data.text: The website collects personal data only in connection with the functionalities offered by the site. The information collected is processed in accordance with the website's privacy policy.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.text: The website uses cookies to improve user experience. By continuing to browse this site, you consent to the use of these cookies.

modification.title: 8. Modification of T&Cs
modification.text: The website reserves the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Any changes will be published on this page and will take effect immediately.

law.title: 9. Applicable Law
law.text: These T&Cs are governed by French law. In the event of a dispute, the competent courts will be those located in the jurisdiction of the website's headquarters.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.text: For any questions regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact us from our contact form.

mentions_legales.title: Legal Notice
mentions_legales.intro_text: This legal notice governs access and use of the website. By accessing this site, you agree to the terms and conditions set forth in this document.

publisher.title: 2. Publisher
publisher.text: The site is published by [Publisher's Name], [Publisher's Address], [SIRET Number, if applicable], [Phone Number], [Contact Email Address].

director.title: 3. Publication Director
director.text: The publication director is [Publication Director's Name].

host.title: 4. Hosting
host.text: The site is hosted by [Host's Name], located at [Host's Address], [Host's Phone Number].

responsibility.title: 5. Responsibility
responsibility.text: The site cannot be held responsible for any direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of the site, including errors in content or data loss.

intellectual_property.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.text: All content on the site, including texts, images, logos, videos, and other elements, is protected by copyright and intellectual property laws. Unauthorized reproduction or use is prohibited.

links.title: 7. Hyperlinks
links.text: Links to other websites may be present. We disclaim any responsibility for their content or privacy policies.

data_protection.title: 8. Personal Data Protection
data_protection.text: Personal information collected on this site is processed in accordance with our privacy policy. You have the right to access, modify, and delete your personal data.

jurisdiction.title: 9. Applicable Law and Competent Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.text: These legal notices are governed by French law. In case of dispute, the competent courts will be those in the jurisdiction of the publisher's head office.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.text: For any questions, please contact us at the following address: [contact email address].

politique_confidentialite.title: Privacy Policy
politique_confidentialite.intro_text: This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, protect, and share your personal data.

data_collection.title: 2. Data Collection
data_collection.text: We collect personal data only when necessary for the proper functioning of our site. This may include information such as your name, email address, and any other information you voluntarily provide.

use_of_data.title: 3. Use of Data
use_of_data.text: The information we collect is used to provide and improve our services, personalize your experience on the site, and respond to your requests. We will never share your data with third parties without your explicit consent.

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.text: We take appropriate security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

cookies.title: 5. Use of Cookies
cookies.text: This site uses cookies to improve the user experience. You have the option to manage your cookie preferences through your browser.

third_party_services.title: 6. Third-Party Services
third_party_services.text: We may use third-party services to analyze site usage and improve our services. These services may collect information such as your IP address and browsing data on our site.

user_rights.title: 7. User Rights
user_rights.text: Under applicable law, you have the right to access, correct, delete, or restrict the use of your personal data. You may also withdraw your consent at any time.

data_retention.title: 8. Data Retention
data_retention.text: We will retain your personal data as long as necessary to fulfill your needs, for the purposes outlined in this policy, or until you request its deletion.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.text: For any questions regarding this privacy policy, please contact us at the following address: [contact email address].
